title: I have never used malicious 3rd party programs or modifications, my account has been banned
body: I have never used malicious 3rd party programs or modifications, and I have spent over 1800 NZ dollars on my account, you told me my account has been banned? I need a explanation and an apology!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!This made me really angry!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! contact me as soon as possible!!!!!!

replies.body: You'll need to submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to contact Riot about your ban. If you were banned for illegal 3rd party programs they will be unable to give you details on what they found though, to help prevent players from using that information to circumvent detection.

Thanks a lot, I did submit a ticket, now I am waiting for the reply. If I used these 3rd part cheat something, I will have nothing to say. However, I have never used any of these! I can't stand they** slander** me, I just played with my friends a few days ago and until today I suddenly got that e-mail. So I feel so angry.
Riot is full of shit tbh. They are banning players who do not deserve the ban while they are letting toxic players roam freely. They can go fuck themselves dude
